contactOptions.title: Email Us
contactOptions.description: Send us an email for general inquiries

faqs.question: What types of projects do you work on?
faqs.answer: We work on a wide range of digital projects including web applications, mobile apps, e-commerce platforms, enterprise software, and custom integrations. Our expertise spans across various industries including healthcare, finance, retail, and education.

faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scope. Simple websites typically take 2-4 weeks, while complex web applications can take 3-6 months. We provide detailed project timelines during our initial consultation based on your specific requirements.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages. This includes security updates, bug fixes, performance optimization, and feature enhancements. We believe in long-term partnerships with our clients.

faqs.question: What is your development process?
faqs.answer: We follow an agile development methodology with regular client communication. Our process includes discovery, planning, design, development, testing, deployment, and ongoing support. We provide regular updates and demos throughout the project.

faqs.question: Do you work with international clients?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We work with clients worldwide. Our team is experienced in working across different time zones and we use modern collaboration tools to ensure smooth communication regardless of location.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and various databases. For mobile development, we use React Native and Flutter. We also have expertise in cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.
